overview: Before joining New England Development, Dawn Neher served as senior vice president at Aetna Realty Investors where she specialized in acquisitions and joint ventures. Ms. Neher received a bachelor’s degree from the University of Hartford and a master’s in business administration from the University of Connecticut. Her professional affiliations include memberships in the International Council of Shopping Centers, Urban Land Institute, New England Women in Real Estate, National Association of Female Executives, The Boston Club, and Real Estate Finance Association.

relationships.title: Chief Financial Officer, Executive Vice President
